CLIÂ¶

balance_check

Given a year compare the values in fcast.xlsm and '<year> Account Balances.tsv'

bank_actl_load

Converts extracts from Moneydance bank and credit card balances to a dataframe of changes

iande_actl_load

Load data from 'data/iande.tsv' into tab 'iande_actl'

invest_actl_load

Update the tab 'invest_actl'

ira_distr

transfers_actl_load

For actual years, loads the non-bank transfers into the 'transfers_actl' tab
